segments.text: OK , Dead Man . If this doesn't start your engine , nothing will .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Hey , do you know how espresso got its name ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's because of the way the steam and boiling water are pressed through the coffee . Es-PRESS-o , get it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Uh , are you sure about that ? I thought espresso was an Italian word .
segments.speaker: S1
